casebody.data:
J. S. UPSHAW, Appellant, v. WESTERN UNION TELEGRAPH COMPANY, a Corporation, Appellee. No. 5741. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Jan. 30, 1930. Emett C. Choate, of Miami, Fla., for appellant. J. Julien Southerland, of Miami, Fla. (Francis R. Stark, of New York City, on the brief), for appellee.

Before BRYAN and FOSTER, Circuit Judges, and GRUBB, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment in the above numbered and entitled cause is affirmed.
